title: Avocado Milkshake
directions: Toss all the ingredients in a blender and whizz them up! Let it go for a while because the avocados need to break down and blend with the milk. Once the liquid is Kermit the Frog green, itâ€™s ready. Taste it and add more sugar or lime juice as needed.
ingredients: 2 cups milk or coconut beverage or other non-dairy milk
